items.name: Kaleidoscope
items.desc:
12x 440ml cans of 4.2% Pale Ale.
Kaleidoscope combines three different hops to create a seasonally evolving flavour profile. Whilst the hops may change, our intention remains the same - to create a beer that is harmonious, bright and refreshing.
Suitable for vegans.

Nationwide delivery takes 2-3 working days.

items.name: Milk Shake
items.desc:

Milk Shake is brewed with sugar from cow’s milk to give the beer a sweet, creamy tone. The beer combines copious chocolate malts laced with vanilla and cacao to create a luxurious, milkshake-rich and satisfyingly dark beer.

items.name: Mixed
items.desc:
6 x 440ml cans of Kaleidoscope Pale Ale, 6 x 440ml cans of Milk Shake Milk Stout.
Our next mixed case features a brand new combination! This time, our bestselling Pale Ale joins forces with our deliciously indulgent Milk Shake Stout, for a truly diverse case of beers.
Kaleidoscope combines three different hops to create a seasonally evolving flavour profile. Whilst the hops may change, our intention remains the same - to create a beer that is harmonious, bright and refreshing.
Milk Shake is brewed with sugar from cow’s milk to give the beer a sweet, creamy tone. The beer combines copious chocolate malts laced with vanilla and cacao to create a luxurious, milkshake-rich and satisfyingly dark beer.
Kaleidoscope is suitable for vegans. Milk Shake is not suitable for vegans.

items.desc:
